00124 cache_inode_status_t cache_inode_read_conf_hash_parameter( config_file_t in_config,
00125                                                            cache_inode_parameter_t * pparam )
00126 {
00127   int     var_max ;
00128   int     var_index ;
00129   int     err ;
00130   char *  key_name ;
00131   char *  key_value ;
00132   config_item_t   block;
00133 
00134    /* Is the config tree initialized ? */
00135   if( in_config == NULL || pparam == NULL )
00136     return CACHE_INODE_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00137 
00138   /* Get the config BLOCK */
00139   if( ( block = config_FindItemByName( in_config, CONF_LABEL_CACHE_INODE_HASH ) ) == NULL )
00140     {
00141       /* fprintf(stderr, "Cannot read item \"%s\" from configuration file\n", CONF_LABEL_CACHE_INODE_HASH ) ; */
00142       return CACHE_INODE_NOT_FOUND ;
00143     }
00144   else if ( config_ItemType(block) != CONFIG_ITEM_BLOCK )
00145     {
00146       /* Expected to be a block*/
00147       return CACHE_INODE_INVALID_ARGUMENT;
00148     }
00149     
00150   
00151   var_max = config_GetNbItems( block );
00152   
00153   for( var_index = 0 ; var_index < var_max ; var_index++ )
00154     {
00155       config_item_t item;
00156     
00157       item = config_GetItemByIndex( block, var_index );
00158     
00159       /* Get key's name */
00160       if( ( err = config_GetKeyValue( item,
00161                                       &key_name,
00162                                       &key_value ) ) != 0 )
00163         {
00164           fprintf(stderr, "Error reading key[%d] from section \"%s\" of configuration file.\n",
00165                   var_index, CONF_LABEL_CACHE_INODE_HASH ) ;
00166           return CACHE_INODE_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00167         }
00168 
00169       if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Index_Size" ) )
00170         {
00171           pparam->hparam.index_size = atoi( key_value ) ;
00172         }
00173       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Alphabet_Length" ) )
00174         {
00175           pparam->hparam.alphabet_length = atoi( key_value ) ;
00176         }
00177       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Prealloc_Node_Pool_Size" ) ) 
00178         {
00179           pparam->hparam.nb_node_prealloc = atoi( key_value ) ;
00180         }
00181       else
00182         {
00183            fprintf( stderr,
00184                    "Unknown or unsettable key: %s (item %s)\n",
00185                    key_name, CONF_LABEL_CACHE_INODE_HASH ) ;
00186           return CACHE_INODE_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00187         }
00188     }
00189   
00190 
00191   return CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS ;
00192 } /* cache_inode_read_conf_hash_parameter */

00208 cache_inode_status_t cache_inode_read_conf_client_parameter( config_file_t in_config,
00209                                                              cache_inode_client_parameter_t * pparam ) 
00210 {
00211   int     var_max ;
00212   int     var_index ;
00213   int     err ;
00214   char *  key_name ;
00215   char *  key_value ;
00216   config_item_t   block;
00217 
00218   int  DebugLevel   = -1;
00219   char * LogFile    = NULL;
00220   
00221   /* Is the config tree initialized ? */
00222   if( in_config == NULL || pparam == NULL )
00223     return CACHE_INODE_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00224 
00225   /* Get the config BLOCK */
00226   if( ( block = config_FindItemByName( in_config, CONF_LABEL_CACHE_INODE_CLIENT ) ) == NULL )
00227     {
00228       /* fprintf(stderr, "Cannot read item \"%s\" from configuration file\n", CONF_LABEL_CACHE_INODE_CLIENT ) ; */
00229       return CACHE_INODE_NOT_FOUND ;
00230     }
00231   else if ( config_ItemType(block) != CONFIG_ITEM_BLOCK )
00232     {
00233       /* Expected to be a block*/
00234       return CACHE_INODE_INVALID_ARGUMENT;
00235     }
00236   
00237   var_max = config_GetNbItems( block );
00238 
00239   for( var_index = 0 ; var_index < var_max ; var_index++ )
00240     {
00241       config_item_t item;
00242     
00243       item = config_GetItemByIndex( block, var_index );
00244       
00245       /* Get key's name */
00246       if( ( err = config_GetKeyValue( item,
00247                                       &key_name,
00248                                       &key_value ) ) != 0 )
00249         {
00250           fprintf(stderr, "Error reading key[%d] from section \"%s\" of configuration file.\n",
00251                   var_index, CONF_LABEL_CACHE_INODE_CLIENT ) ;
00252           return CACHE_INODE_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00253         }
00254   
00255       if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "LRU_Prealloc_PoolSize" ) )
00256         {
00257           pparam->lru_param.nb_entry_prealloc = atoi( key_value ) ;
00258         }
00259       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "LRU_Nb_Call_Gc_invalid" ) )
00260         {
00261           pparam->lru_param.nb_call_gc_invalid = atoi( key_value ) ;
00262         } 
00263       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Entry_Prealloc_PoolSize" ) )
00264         {
00265           pparam->nb_prealloc_entry = atoi( key_value ) ;
00266         }
00267       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "DirData_Prealloc_PoolSize" ) )
00268         {
00269           pparam->nb_pre_dir_data = atoi( key_value ) ;
00270         }
00271       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "ParentData_Prealloc_PoolSize" ) )
00272         {
00273           pparam->nb_pre_parent = atoi( key_value ) ;
00274         }
00275       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "State_v4_Prealloc_PoolSize" ) ) 
00276         {
00277           pparam->nb_pre_state_v4 = atoi( key_value ) ;
00278         }
00279       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Attr_Expiration_Time" ) ) 
00280         {
00281           pparam->grace_period_attr = atoi( key_value ) ;
00282         }
00283       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Symlink_Expiration_Time" ) ) 
00284         {
00285           pparam->grace_period_link  = atoi( key_value ) ;
00286         }
00287       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Directory_Expiration_Time" ) ) 
00288         {
00289           pparam->grace_period_dirent = atoi( key_value ) ;
00290         }
00291       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Use_Getattr_Directory_Invalidation" ) )
00292         {
00293           pparam->getattr_dir_invalidation = StrToBoolean( key_value ) ;
00294         }
00295       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Use_Test_Access" ) )
00296         {
00297           pparam->use_test_access = atoi( key_value ) ;
00298         }
00299       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Max_Fd" ) )
00300         {
00301           pparam->max_fd_per_thread = atoi( key_value ) ;
00302         }
00303       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "OpenFile_Retention" ) )
00304         {
00305           pparam->retention = atoi( key_value ) ;
00306         }
00307       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Use_OpenClose_cache" ) )
00308         {
00309           pparam->use_cache = StrToBoolean( key_value ) ;
00310         }
00311       else if ( !strcasecmp( key_name, "DebugLevel" ) )
00312       {
00313         DebugLevel = ReturnLevelAscii( key_value );
00314 
00315         if ( DebugLevel == -1 )
00316         {
00317           DisplayLog("cache_inode_read_conf: ERROR: Invalid debug level name: \"%s\".",
00318                 key_value );
00319           return CACHE_INODE_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00320         }
00321       }
00322       else if ( !strcasecmp( key_name, "LogFile" ) )
00323       {
00324 
00325         LogFile = key_value ;
00326 
00327       }        
00328       else
00329         {
00330           fprintf( stderr,
00331                    "Unknown or unsettable key: %s (item %s)\n",
00332                    key_name, CONF_LABEL_CACHE_INODE_CLIENT ) ;
00333           return CACHE_INODE_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00334         }
00335     }
00336     
00337     
00338   /* init logging */
00339   
00340   if ( LogFile )
00341   {
00342     desc_log_stream_t  log_stream;
00343     
00344     strcpy( log_stream.path , LogFile );
00345     
00346     /* Default : NIV_EVENT */
00347     
00348     if ( DebugLevel == -1 )
00349       AddLogStreamJd( &(pparam->log_outputs),
00350           V_FILE, log_stream, NIV_CRIT, SUP);
00351     else         
00352       AddLogStreamJd( &(pparam->log_outputs),
00353           V_FILE, log_stream, DebugLevel, SUP);
00354         
00355   }  
00356         
00357   return CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS ;
00358 } /* cache_inode_read_conf_client_parameter */

00374 cache_inode_status_t cache_inode_read_conf_gc_policy( config_file_t in_config,
00375                                                       cache_inode_gc_policy_t * ppolicy ) 
00376 {
00377   int     var_max ;
00378   int     var_index ;
00379   int     err ;
00380   char *  key_name ;
00381   char *  key_value ;
00382   config_item_t   block;
00383   
00384   /* Is the config tree initialized ? */
00385   if( in_config == NULL || ppolicy == NULL  )
00386     return CACHE_INODE_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00387   
00388   /* Get the config BLOCK */
00389   if( ( block = config_FindItemByName( in_config, CONF_LABEL_CACHE_INODE_GCPOL ) ) == NULL )
00390     {
00391       /* fprintf(stderr, "Cannot read item \"%s\" from configuration file\n", CONF_LABEL_CACHE_INODE_GCPOL ) ; */
00392       return CACHE_INODE_NOT_FOUND ;
00393     }
00394   else if ( config_ItemType(block) != CONFIG_ITEM_BLOCK )
00395     {
00396       /* Expected to be a block*/
00397       return CACHE_INODE_INVALID_ARGUMENT;
00398     }
00399   
00400   var_max = config_GetNbItems( block );
00401   
00402   for( var_index = 0 ; var_index < var_max ; var_index++ )
00403     {
00404       config_item_t item;
00405     
00406       item = config_GetItemByIndex( block, var_index );
00407       
00408       /* Get key's name */
00409       if( ( err = config_GetKeyValue( item,
00410                                       &key_name,
00411                                       &key_value ) ) != 0 )
00412         {
00413           fprintf(stderr, "Error reading key[%d] from section \"%s\" of configuration file.\n",
00414             var_index, CONF_LABEL_CACHE_INODE_GCPOL );
00415           return CACHE_INODE_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00416         }
00417 
00418       if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "File_Lifetime" ) )
00419         {
00420           ppolicy->file_expiration_delay = atoi( key_value ) ;
00421         }
00422       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Directory_Lifetime" ) ) 
00423         {
00424           ppolicy->directory_expiration_delay = atoi( key_value ) ;
00425         }
00426       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "NbEntries_HighWater" ) ) 
00427         {
00428           ppolicy->hwmark_nb_entries = atoi( key_value ) ;
00429         }
00430       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "NbEntries_LowWater" ) ) 
00431         {
00432           ppolicy->lwmark_nb_entries = atoi( key_value ) ;
00433         }
00434       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Runtime_Interval" ) )
00435         {
00436           ppolicy->run_interval = atoi( key_value ) ;
00437         }
00438       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Nb_Call_Before_GC" ) )
00439         {
00440           ppolicy->nb_call_before_gc = atoi( key_value ) ;
00441         }
00442       else
00443         {
00444           fprintf( stderr,
00445                    "Unknown or unsettable key: %s (item %s)\n",
00446                    key_name, CONF_LABEL_CACHE_INODE_GCPOL ) ;
00447           return CACHE_INODE_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00448         }
00449       
00450     }
00451   
00452 
00453   return CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS ;
00454 } /* cache_inode_read_conf_gc_policy */

00469 void cache_inode_print_conf_hash_parameter( FILE * output, cache_inode_parameter_t param )
00470 {
00471   fprintf( output, "CacheInode Hash: Index_Size              = %d\n", param.hparam.index_size ) ;
00472   fprintf( output, "CacheInode Hash: Alphabet_Length         = %d\n", param.hparam.alphabet_length ) ;
00473   fprintf( output, "CacheInode Hash: Prealloc_Node_Pool_Size = %d\n", param.hparam.nb_node_prealloc ) ;
00474 } /* cache_inode_print_conf_hash_parameter */

00489 void cache_inode_print_conf_client_parameter( FILE * output,  
00490                                               cache_inode_client_parameter_t param ) 
00491 {
00492   fprintf( output, "CacheInode Client: LRU_Prealloc_PoolSize        = %d\n",
00493            param.lru_param.nb_entry_prealloc ) ;
00494   fprintf( output, "CacheInode Client: LRU_Nb_Call_Gc_invalid       = %d\n",
00495            param.lru_param.nb_call_gc_invalid ) ;
00496   fprintf( output, "CacheInode Client: Entry_Prealloc_PoolSize      = %d\n", param.nb_prealloc_entry ) ;
00497   fprintf( output, "CacheInode Client: DirData_Prealloc_PoolSize    = %d\n", param.nb_pre_dir_data ) ;
00498   fprintf( output, "CacheInode Client: ParentData_Prealloc_PoolSize = %d\n", param.nb_pre_parent ) ;
00499   fprintf( output, "CacheInode Client: Attr_Expiration_Time         = %d\n", (int)param.grace_period_attr ) ;
00500   fprintf( output, "CacheInode Client: Symlink_Expiration_Time      = %d\n", (int)param.grace_period_link ) ;
00501   fprintf( output, "CacheInode Client: Directory_Expiration_Time    = %d\n", (int)param.grace_period_dirent ) ;  
00502   fprintf( output, "CacheInode Client: Use_Test_Access              = %d\n", param.use_test_access ) ;
00503 } /* cache_inode_print_conf_client_parameter */

00517 void cache_inode_print_conf_gc_policy( FILE * output,  cache_inode_gc_policy_t  gcpolicy )
00518 {
00519   fprintf( output, "Garbagge Policy: File_Lifetime       = %d\n", gcpolicy.file_expiration_delay ) ;
00520   fprintf( output, "Garbagge Policy: Directory_Lifetime  = %d\n", gcpolicy.directory_expiration_delay ) ;
00521   fprintf( output, "Garbagge Policy: NbEntries_HighWater = %d\n", gcpolicy.hwmark_nb_entries ) ;
00522   fprintf( output, "Garbagge Policy: NbEntries_LowWater  = %d\n", gcpolicy.lwmark_nb_entries ) ;
00523   fprintf( output, "Garbagge Policy: Nb_Call_Before_GC   = %d\n", gcpolicy.nb_call_before_gc ) ;
00524   fprintf( output, "Garbagge Policy: Runtime_Interval    = %d\n", gcpolicy.run_interval ) ;
00525 } /* cache_inode_print_gc_pol */
